processingCommand.script:
:PRINT "Get DB servers"
:SET &DB_VARA# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "AFSM_DB_VARA", 1)

:SET &WMS_DB_SERVER# = ""
:SET &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:SET &WMS_DB_PORT# = ""
:SET &WMS_DB_SID# = ""
:SET &WMS_DB_SEC# = ""
:SET &WMS_DB_DR# = ""
:SET &WMS_DB_DR_SID# = ""


:SET &SEQ_HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&DB_VARA#)
:PROCESS &SEQ_HND#
:  SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&SEQ_HND#, 1)
:  SWITCH "Y"
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-DB_VIP_PRI"
:        SET &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &WMS_DB_PORT# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 2)
:        SET &WMS_DB_SID# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 3)
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-DB_WMS_DR"
:        SET &WMS_DB_DR# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &WMS_DB_PORT# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 2)
:        SET &WMS_DB_DR_SID# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 3)
:        SET &URLS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 4)
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-DB_WMS_SEC"
:        SET &WMS_DB_SEC# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-DB_WMS"
:        SET &WMS_DB_SERVER# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &URLS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 4)
:  ENDSWITCH
:ENDPROCESS

:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_SEC#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_DR_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_DR#,,WORKFLOW
